movies.title: The Nifty Nineties
movies.plot: Mickey courts Minnie in the Gay Nineties: they take in a vaudeville show and go for a drive in his horseless carriage, to the strains of "While Strolling Through the Park" and "In the Good Old Summertime". Goofy rides by on a penny-farthing bicycle, and the whole Duck family rides by on a bicycle built for five.

biography.bio: George Johnson is an actor, known for The Nifty Nineties (1941), How to Play Baseball (1942) and How to Fish (1942).
biography.name: George Johnson

biography.bio: Clarence Nash was born on December 7, 1904 in Watonga, Oklahoma, USA as Clarence Charles Nash. He was an actor, known for The Three Caballeros (1944), Mickey and the Beanstalk (1947) and Mickey's Christmas Carol (1983). He was married to Margaret Seamans. He died on February 20, 1985 in Glendale, California, USA.
biography.name: Clarence Nash

actors.character: Donald Duck / Daisy / Huey / Dewey / Louie
